content: bags to mobiles and hanging decorations it can be sewn onto blankets or bags by sewing around the edges of colour b to make the butterflies into hanging decorations attach string to the top of the body behind antenna i d love to see your own creations share and tag using my socials @love_woolcraft @love_woolcraft @lovewoolcraft this pattern is property of love woolcraft it may not be resold copied or shared items made with this pattern may be sold and shared but love woolcraft should be credited as the designer where appropriate little butterfly | no 2 | love woodcraft 2020
